rooms.description: spacious entryway with integrated reception area and cloakroom, aligned along the auspicious north-east direction following Vastu principles.
open-plan living room with Scandinavian minimalist design, incorporating large windows for natural light; includes a small home theatre area.
modern dining area adjacent to the living room, featuring a long table seating and accent lighting; designed following Vastu’s south-east alignment.
Scandinavian style kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances, designed for functionality and ease; positioned towards the north-west as per Vastu.
ensuite bathroom for the living area with modern fixtures, placed in a discreet location to maintain privacy; alignment respects Vastu’s water element principles.
spacious master bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the garden; designed in Scandinavian style with clean lines and a calming palette; located in the north-west direction for positivity.
additional bedroom designed with Scandinavian minimalism, includes a spacious balcony for fresh air and sunlight; placed in north-east direction.
third bedroom with Scandinavian decor, also featuring a balcony; ideal for relaxation and maintaining balance in accordance with Vastu.
fourth bedroom designed with a Scandinavian aesthetic and balcony access; offers ample natural light.
fifth bedroom with Scandinavian style and private balcony; provides a serene environment.
dedicated private gym area integrated within the ground floor; designed for convenience and a modern Scandinavian interior, ensuring privacy.
versatile study area for work and leisure, featuring Scandinavian design with ample lighting; positioned in the south-west.

openings.description: main entrance door positioned on the north side to harness positive energy per Vastu.
secondary exit leading towards the private gym area.

additional_features.description: each bedroom includes a private balcony designed for relaxation and enjoying natural light, aligned with Scandinavian design principles.
landscaped garden area on the south-east corner of the plot to promote tranquility and balance.
